system.description:
You have become a being of living shadow, slipping undetected through the night, dealing death as you go. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Dexterity, Constitution, or Intelligence increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • When you are below your maximum hit points, you are lightly obscured and the light level drops by one step. If you are bloodied, the light level around you drops by two steps.
  • When you are in dim light or darker, when you deal @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.4727pnvz5nwn3h23]{Sneak Attack} damage, you deal an additional 2d6 points of necrotic damage and the target’s maximum hit points are reduced by the same amount until it finishes a long rest.
  • When you are in darkness or magical darkness, all of your bloodblade levels count as rogue levels for the purpose of determining your sneak attack damage.
